hours_text:
## Office: Monday-Thursday, 9:00-4:00. Or by chance.

## Library: **_Open by appointment._ **Please call or [email](mailto:info@woodstockhistorycenter.org) in advance so that we may may better assist you.

  * We encourage researchers to submit a [Research Request Form](https://www.woodstockhistorycenter.org/research-requests) prior to visiting the History Center.

[ Jan 22 ](/calendar/2026/1/22/losers-of-the-american-revolution)

Jan 22, 2026

[Zoom Program: Losers of the American Revolution ](/calendar/2026/1/22/losers-of-the-american-revolution)

Jan 22, 2026

Not all Americans found themselves benefitting from the American Revolution. Many Americans who had remained loyal to the King ended up losing their homes and suffering incredible alienation because of their beliefs.

Jan 22, 2026

> ## _We preserve the history of the Woodstock area, engage in local, place-based education, and serve as a center for historical research._
